column1: The Pit Room////Wow this place is amazing with lots of flavor. I could smell the food before I walked in.  The  staff were very nice and let me sample a couple of sides which I ordered both including the beans and sautéed okra that I'll try to duplicate at home now.  The chicken and beef links were good.  They even have a salsa bar fully loaded with peppers
column5: and a couple of other things.  They also sell beef ribs!
